price: 41. Nous avons tout détaillé dans ce Coran afin qu’ils y réfléchissent, mais cela ne fait qu’accentuer leur aversion.
arabic: وَلَقَدۡ صَرَّفۡنَا فِي هَٰذَا ٱلۡقُرۡءَانِ لِيَذَّكَّرُواْ وَمَا يَزِيدُهُمۡ إِلَّا نُفُورٗا

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: walaqad ṣarrafnā fī hādhā al-qur'āni liyadhakkarū wamā yazīduhum illā nufūran
